summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for JEGE, LLC, a limited liability company formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the structure, management, and operational guidelines of the company, including capital contributions, membership units, and the roles of the Sole Member and Manager.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member who formed JEGE, LLC and is responsible for its operations and management.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is designated as the Manager of JEGE, LLC, responsible for managing the business and affairs of the company.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the Sole Member, employs Lawrence Visoski as the Manager of the company.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite IS, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The Operating Agreement was executed on October 19, 2012.
JEGE, LLC is organized under the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.
The company is managed by a Sole Member, Jeffrey E. Epstein, and a Manager, Lawrence Visoski.
The Sole Member has the authority to make capital contributions and manage the company's affairs.
The company may conduct operations under one or more assumed names as permitted by law.
